Title: Floral Evening Gown with Sheer Illusion Skirt

----

Sku: S5240

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 8, 6, 10, 4

----

Colors: royal, red

----

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: S5240-royal-floral-evening-gown-with-sheer-illusion-skirt_p.jpg

----

Description: This mock two piece features a sweetheart neckline and sleeveless bodice. The waistline line is accented with a satin sash. The gown is above the knee with a floral applique design and rhinestones for sparkle. The illusion skirt features the same applique detailing on the train of the skirt to give the appearance that petals are falling around you. Beautiful.
